Attributes.description: Selected advanced topics in CFD, typically chosen from: Finite volume methods on curvilinear meshes and structured mesh generation. Finite volume methods on unstructured meshes. Multigrid methods for elliptic PDE's. Reynolds-averaged form of the Navier-Stokes equations and turbulence modelling. Three-dimensional flows. Compressible flows.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 16:00, End Time: 17:00, Building: MacLeod, Room: 2014
